plot: Grabinsky, who runs an artificial limb store, is suddenly awakened to the fact that someone has stolen an artificial limb from his place, and the man who took it quickly rushes out of doors...
title: Don't Pull My Leg
plot_es: Grabinsky, who runs an artificial limb store, is suddenly awakened to the fact that someone has stolen an artificial limb from his place, and the man who took it quickly rushes out of doors...
plot_en: Grabinsky, who runs an artificial limb store, is suddenly awakened to the fact that someone has stolen an artificial limb from his place, and the man who took it quickly rushes out of doors...
